thread.title: Consumer Reports: experiencing bad customer service?
thread.title_full: Consumer Reports: experiencing bad customer service? - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Consumer Reports: experiencing bad customer service?
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - Do you have a hard time getting results when you seek out customer service? Our Roger Garrity has some tips for you from Tod Marks of Consumer Reports.
Watch the video for more information.
